suspects.name: The Joker
suspects.full_name: Jack Oswald White, Arthur Kent, Jack Napier
suspects.aliases: Red Hood I, Clown Prince of Crime, Harlequin of Hate, Mr. J, Joe Kerr
suspects.affiliations: Black Glove, Injustice Gang, Injustice League, Joker League of Anarchy
suspects.relatives: Jeannie (wife, Deceased); Unborn son (Deceased); Melvin Reipan (Cousin, Deceased)
suspects.notes: Just the worst. Really, no joke!

suspects.name: Two-Face
suspects.relatives: Duela Dent (Daughter), Gilda Dent (Wife), Poison Ivy (Former-Fiance), Rachel Dawes (Girlfriend, Deceased)
suspects.notes: Has two faces. One is super gross.

suspects.name: Penguin
suspects.notes: Not actually a penguin. Smells like one though.

suspects.name: Poison Ivy
suspects.affiliations: Formerly Injustice Gang, Suicide Squad, Harley Quinn, Secret Society of Super Villains, Joker League of Anarchy
suspects.notes: Worse than actual Poison Ivy. Especially for the bank account.

suspects.name: Mister Freeze
suspects.aliases: Mister Zero, Doctor Zero, Doctor Schimmell, King of Cold, Crown Prince Chilblains
suspects.affiliations: Injustice League Unlimited, Secret Society of Super-Villains, League of Villainy, Task Force Z
suspects.relatives: Nora Fries (wife, deceased, then resurrected as Lazara), Charles (Father) and Lorraine Fries (Mother)
suspects.notes: Cold as ice, and willing to sacrifice FOR his love.

suspects.name: Bane
suspects.affiliations: Suicide Squad, Secret Society of Super Villains, Secret Six
suspects.notes: Loves venom. Not much of a talker. Worse if Ivy is around

suspects.name: The Riddler
suspects.affiliations: Secret Society of Super Villains, Justice League of Arkham
suspects.notes: Riddle me this: nobody likes riddles.

suspects.name: Harley Quinn
suspects.aliases: Cupid of Crime, Jane Wisakedjak, Elise Archer, Pumpkin Pooh, Puddin'
suspects.affiliations: Formerly Legion of Doom, Formerly The Quintets, The Joker, Poison Ivy, Secret Six, Suicide Squad
suspects.relatives: Barry Quinzel (brother), Sharon Quinzel (mother), Nick Quinzel (father), Jenny Quinzel (niece), Nicky Quinzel (nephew)

suspects.name: Scarecrow
suspects.affiliations: Injustice League, Injustice Gang, Secret Society of Super Villains, Sinestro Corps
suspects.relatives: Gerald Crane (Father), Karen Keeny (Mother), Unnamed (Half-sister), Marion Keeny (Grandmother, Deceased)
suspects.notes: Who's afraid of a SCARECROW? Pfffft! Crows probably.

suspects.name: Killer Croc
suspects.affiliations: Secret Society of Super Villains, Medusa, Black Mask
suspects.notes: Half killer, half crocodile, half douchebag.

suspects.name: Catwoman
suspects.aliases: The Cat, Irena Dubrovna, Elva Barr, Sadie Kelowski, Madame Moderne, Marguerite Tone
suspects.affiliations: Batman Family, Outsiders; Formerly Birds of Prey, Injustice League, Secret Society of Super Villains
suspects.relatives: Carmine Falcone (Father), Maria Kyle (Mother, Deceased), Maggie Kyle (Sister), Helena Kyle (Daughter)
suspects.notes: Rogue? Ally? Friend or foe? Answer: cat.

suspects.name: Ra's al Ghul
suspects.occupation: Eco Terrorist, Cult Leader, Assassin, Businessman
suspects.affiliations: League of Assassins, League of Shadows
suspects.relatives: The Sensei (Father), Dusan al Ghul (Son, AKA White Ghost), Talia al Ghul (Daughter), Nyssa Raatko (Daughter), Damian Wayne (Grandson, AKA Robin V)

suspects.name: Man-Bat
suspects.affiliations: Formerly Spirit Squad, The Network, Secret Society of Super Villains
suspects.relatives: Francine Langstrom (wife), Rebecca Elizabeth Langtrom (daughter); Aaron Langstrom (son); Britt Langstrom (sister); Ted Friedel (brother-in-law)
suspects.notes: I'm not mad. It's not like I had an IP lawyer look into his name or anything. The most notorious crimes...are copyright crimes.
